title: Android 10 is not as smooth as 9.0 pie
content:
Android 10 doesn't hve smooth transition between apps and apps opening time is also some kind of lagging effect
Iam experiencing ram management issue when 4 or 5 apps runn on background and switching between them will restart the apps 
Iam not seeing any seek bar and focus mode on digital wellbeing in my pixel 3a running Android 10 with November patch
